title: GOOGLE PIXEL 4XL batteries stuck at 50% and could not charge and keep shutting down
content:
I tried to follow all of the steps in the google support, 
1. restart
2. turn off the phone with all of the button (sound key up & down, main key)
3. connect with laptop

It does not work at all, my phone is only one and I need to work in a business day

Please do the replacement or give any comment for it asap.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
